description: La Cuica Cosmica initiative, inspired by ancestral wisdom and the teachings of permaculture, aims to promote sustainable practices through composting and organic gardening. Founded by a passionate group, it emphasizes the importance of understanding waste management and fostering a connection with nature. By offering workshops and educational resources, the initiative seeks to empower communities to embrace ecological practices, enhance food sovereignty, and cultivate a deeper relationship with the environment.
name: La Cuica Cosmica
